mapper.select: select t1.apply_id applyId,t1.state,t1.apply_type applyType,t2.title,t2.start_date startDate,t2.end_date endDate from apply_info t1 left join journey_info t2 on t1.journey_id = t2.journey_id where t2.create_by = #{userId} order by CASE WHEN t1.state='S001' THEN t1.create_time END DESC,t1.update_time DESC

SELECT messageId,messageType,messageTypeStr,count(*) messageCount from ( select apply_id as messageId,1 as messageType,'申请'as messageTypeStr from apply_info where state!='S002' and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299') union ( select approve_result_id as messageId,2 as messageType,'审批'as messageTypeStr from apply_approve_result_info where apply_id in (select apply_id from apply_info where state!='S002' and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299')) ) union ( select journey_id as messageId,3 as messageType,'行程'as messageTypeStr from journey_info where user_id = #{userId} and journey_id in (select journey_id from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299') ) union ( select order_id as messageId,4 as messageType,'派车'as messageTypeStr from order_info where journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) and state!='S299' )) a group by a.messageType

SELECT messageId,messageType,messageTypeStr,count(*) messageCount from ( select apply_id as messageId,1 as messageType,'申请'as messageTypeStr from apply_info where state!='S002' and journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where user_id = #{userId}) ) a group by a.messageType

SELECT count(*) from ( select apply_id from apply_info where create_by=#{userId} and state='S001' union all( select approve_result_id from apply_approve_result_info where state=#{state} and find_in_set(#{userId},approve_user_id) ) ) a

where state=#{state} and journey_id in (select journey_id from journey_info where DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(use_car_time ,INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now() , '%Y-%m-%d') or ( start_date is not null and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(start_date ,INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now() , '%Y-%m-%d') ) )
select count(1) from apply_info where regimen_id=#{regimeId}

SELECT DISTINCT oi.order_id orderId FROM apply_info ai LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ai.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id WHERE ai.apply_id = #{applyId}

SELECT eu.nick_name nickName, eu.phonenumber phonenumber, jpi.name vehicleUser , jpi.mobile vehicleUserMobile, ai.notes notes, ji.use_time useTime, ji.start_date startDate, oi.state state, euOne.phonenumber innerPhonenumber, euTwo.phonenumber outerPhonenumber, di.mobile driverMobile, oi.order_number orderNumber FROM apply_info ai LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ai.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info jpi ON jpi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON ai.create_by = eu.user_id LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.journey_id = ai.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_dispatche_detail_info oddi ON oi.order_id = oddi.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user euOne ON oddi.inner_dispatcher = euOne.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user euTwo ON oddi.outer_dispatcher = euTwo.user_id LEFT JOIN driver_info di ON di.driver_id = oi.driver_id WHERE apply_id = #{applyId}
select a.car_type_id as carTypeId from order_info o left join apply_info a on o.journey_id=a.journey_id where o.order_id=#{orderId}

select ecti.name carTypeName, ai.car_type_id carTypeId, ai.notes, ai.it_is_self_driver itIsSelfDriver, ai.reason reason, ai.safe_remind safeRemind, cgi.car_group_name carGroupName from apply_info ai left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ai.car_type_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi on cgi.car_group_id=ai.outer_car_group_id WHERE ai.journey_id=#{journeyId}

mapper.select: SELECT ai.apply_id applyId, ai.journey_id journeyId, jucp.node_id nodeId, jpi.journey_passenger_id journeyPassengerId, jppi.price_id priceId, jucp.power_id powerId, oddi.dispatch_id dispatchId, jppi.order_id orderId FROM apply_info ai LEFT JOIN journey_user_car_power jucp ON ai.apply_id = jucp.apply_id LEFT JOIN journey_plan_price_info jppi ON jppi.journey_id = ai.journey_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info jpi ON jpi.journey_id = ai.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_dispatche_detail_info oddi ON oddi.order_id = jppi.order_id where ai.apply_id = #{applyId}

SELECT ai.apply_id AS applyId, ai.journey_id AS journeyId, ji.start_date AS applyDate, ji.use_time AS applyDays, jpi.`name` AS userName, jpi.mobile AS userPhone, ai.reason AS reason, ai.notes AS notes, jpi.peer_number AS peerNumber, ai.car_type_id AS carTypeId, ai.it_is_self_driver AS itIsSelfDriver, ai.outer_car_group_id AS outerCarGroupId, ai.safe_remind AS safeRemind FROM apply_info ai LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ai.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info jpi ON jpi.journey_id = ai.journey_id WHERE ai.apply_id = #{applyId}
